aumentos.desc: Everytime you choose to save your Shimmer on a Black Market, heal @Heal@ player health and gain @Gold@ gold. Gain a Renni.
aumentos.name: War for the Undercity

aumentos.desc: Gain a Chem-Baron Emblem and a Renata Glasc.
aumentos.name: Chem-Baron Crest

aumentos.desc: Gain @Heal@ player health and @Gold@ gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
aumentos.name: Tiniest Titan

aumentos.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Anvils@ completed item anvils.
aumentos.name: BRB

aumentos.desc:
Gain @Gold@ gold. Your max interest is increased to @InterestCap@.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
aumentos.name: Hedge Fund

aumentos.desc: Gain a Chem-Baron Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Smeech.
aumentos.name: Chem-Baron Crown

aumentos.desc:
Lose all your gold. After @Rounds@ player combats, gain back the original amount and another @BaseGold@ gold.

Incoming Gold: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_ForwardThinkingGold@
aumentos.name: Forward Thinking

ability.desc:
Briefly gain @DR*100@% Durability and summon a massive claw, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the most enemies in a line. The @NearestEnemies@ closest enemies take @DamageBonus*100@% more damage and are pulled towards Mordekaiser.

For the next @EmpowerDuration@ seconds, gain @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp, +1 Attack Range, and replace every attack with a slam that deals @ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all other enemies within @AttackHexRadius@ hexes.
ability.name: Grasp of the Iron Revenant

aumentos.desc: Your last surviving unit gains @ASBonus*100@% Attack Speed and @DurabilityBonus*100@% Durability
aumentos.name: Lone Hero

aumentos.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for @Duration@ seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to @MaxShield@ Health.
aumentos.name: Sated Spellweaver

aumentos.desc: While Shielded, your units gain @ReducedDamage*100@% Durability. The first time allies fall below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they gain @ShieldAmount1@-@ShieldAmount4@ Shield (based on Stage) for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
aumentos.name: Powered Shields

aumentos.desc:
For every @Mana@ Mana Visionaries spend during combat, summon a Voidling, up to @MaxVoidlings@ Voidlings. Gain a Rell and Morgana.

The Voidling has @Stage2Health@-@Stage6Health@ Health based on Stage.
aumentos.name: Voidcaller

aumentos.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain @ManaPerAttack@ additional Mana per attack.
aumentos.name: Manaflow II

aumentos.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.

Current Chances: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_StarryNight_Odds@%
Chances increase with player level.

aumentos.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a @RerollPercent@% chance to gain a free reroll.
aumentos.name: Prismatic Ticket

ability.desc:
Briefly gain @DR*100@% Durability and summon a massive claw, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the most enemies in a line. The @NearestEnemies@ closest enemies take @DamageBonus*100@% more damage and are pulled towards Mordekaiser.

For the next @EmpowerDuration@ seconds, gain @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp, +1 Attack Range, and replace every attack with a slam that deals @ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all other enemies within @AttackHexRadius@ hexes.
ability.name: Grasp of the Iron Revenant

aumentos.desc: Gain @FreeRerolls@ reroll for every @UnitCount@ unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain @NumChampsToGrant@ two-cost unit.
aumentos.name: Two Much Value

aumentos.desc: Sentinels gain @PercGain*100@% bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Every @Interval@ seconds, their next attack deals @ResistToDamageRatio*100@% of their total resistances as magic damage. Gain a Loris.
aumentos.name: Shield Bash

aumentos.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +@hexincreasetooltip@ hex radius and do @effectincrease*100@% more damage.
aumentos.name: High Voltage

aumentos.desc: Gain @components@ random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain @XP@ XP.
aumentos.name: Slammin'

aumentos.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
aumentos.name: Caretaker's Favor

aumentos.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies @NumDeaths@ times, gain a Support Anvil and remove the Training Dummy.
aumentos.name: Support Mining

aumentos.desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain @goldtogive@ gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.
aumentos.name: Dual Purpose

aumentos.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem and a Rell.
aumentos.name: Sentinel Crest

aumentos.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Loris.
aumentos.name: Sentinel Crown

aumentos.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for @CCImmunityDuration@ seconds.
aumentos.name: Unleash The Beast

aumentos.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain @AS@% Attack Speed.
aumentos.name: Not Today

aumentos.desc: Ambusher kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Camille and a Powder.
aumentos.name: Loot Explosion

aumentos.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
aumentos.name: Living Forge

aumentos.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies @NumDeaths@ times, gain a Support Anvil and remove the Training Dummy.
aumentos.name: Support Mining

aumentos.desc:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
aumentos.name: Portable Forge

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

aumentos.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after @PlayerCombatNum@ player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

aumentos.desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp2Rounds@%)

aumentos.desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp3Rounds@%)

{"apiName":"TFT13_Morgana","nombre":"Morgana","characterName":"TFT13_Morgana","coste":1,"sinergia":[{"apiName":"TFT13_Cabal","desc":"(@MinUnits@) Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after @NumCastsToUnlock@ casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below @PercentHealthUnlock*100@% health.

aumentos.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
aumentos.name: Component Buffet

aumentos.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +@hexincreasetooltip@ hex radius and do @effectincrease*100@% more damage.
aumentos.name: High Voltage

aumentos.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain @AP@ Ability Power and @Armor@ Armor.
aumentos.name: Crown's Will

aumentos.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain @XP@ XP and @Rerolls@ free rerolls.
aumentos.name: Epoch

aumentos.desc:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
aumentos.name: Portable Forge

aumentos.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
aumentos.name: Living Forge

aumentos.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain @HealthBonus@ Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a @ShieldAmount*100@% max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

aumentos.desc:
When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing @TOOLTIPONLYCAITAD@% damage. Ambessa gains @TOOLTIPONLYADSHARE@% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

Gain a Caitlyn and Ambessa.

aumentos.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
aumentos.name: Caretaker's Favor

aumentos.desc: Whenever you build an item, gain a completed item anvil instead. That anvil always offers an Academy item and the item built. Gain @NumItems@ random components. Gain a Lux and an Ezreal.
aumentos.name: Academic Research

aumentos.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a Leona.
aumentos.name: Academy Crest

aumentos.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +@hexincreasetooltip@ hex radius and do @effectincrease*100@% more damage.
aumentos.name: High Voltage
